description: Purchase and delivery of UV Spectrophotometer and related services
tags: Supply Manitoba cabinet hedge, tries false tide, make congruent
full_summary:
*******
**Tender Notification: Acquisition of UV Spectrophotometer**

**[Document Locator: WS3735982548-Doc3745103262]**

**Solicitation Number:** WS3735982548

**Amendment Number:** 1

**Publication Date:** 2022-11-15

**Tender Closing Date and Time (Eastern Time):** 2022-12-09T14:00:00

**Summary:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of a UV Spectrophotometer. The proposed contract is for a closed bid and will be awarded to the bidder with the lowest price.

**Bid Details:**

*   Tender Reference Number: WS3735982548-Doc3745103262
*   Solicitation Number: WS3735982548
*   Tender Closing Date and Time: 2022-12-09T14:00:00
*   Expected Contract Start Date: To be determined
*   Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2023

**Trade Agreements:**

This bid is open to a limited number of contractors. Suppliers must meet the requirements outlined in the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.

**Delivery Locations:**

*   The successful bidder must deliver the UV Spectrophotometer to the Department of Health (HC) in Longueuil, Quebec.

**Contracting Entity:**

*   Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

**End User Entity:**

*   Department of Health (HC)
*   Address: Address Locator 0900C2, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K9, Canada

**Contact Information:**

*   Stephane Dube, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Email: stephane.dube@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   Phone: Not available
*   Fax: Not available

**Note:**

This tender is expired, and no further bids will be accepted.
